column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.

It is impossible to say how long you will live. In general, life expectancies depend on many factors such as lifestyle habits, genetic background, and access to quality medical care. It's impossible for me to give you a definite answer without knowing more about you.
what do you need to know about me

I would need to know your age, medical history, family history, and lifestyle habits in order to make an accurate assessment about life expectancies and what illnesses you may be predisposed to. I advise making an appointment with a primary care doctor to go over these factors and discuss any concerns you may have.

Thank you for providing the information. As a 42 year old vegetarian woman, you have a good chance of living an above average life expectancy. However, I still recommend you visit a primary care doctor for more detailed advice tailored to your individual needs. A doctor can also help you create a personalized healthcare plan that takes into account factors such as your lifestyle, diet, and family history.
